disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为真，则防止用户与该项目交互。

textValue.description: Optional text used for typeahead purposes. By default the typeahead behavior will use the .textContent of the item. Use this when the content is complex, or you have non-textual content inside.
textValue.description_zh: 用于提前打字目的的可选文本。默认情况下，类型前进行为将使用该项目的.textContent。当内容复杂或您内部有非文本内容时，请使用此内容。

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被asChild覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子传递的默认渲染元素，合并他们的道具和行为。

events.name: select
events.description: Event handler called when the user selects an item (via mouse or keyboard). Calling event.preventDefault in this handler will prevent the dropdown menu from closing when selecting that item.
events.description_zh: 当用户选择项目（通过鼠标或键盘）时调用事件处理程序。在此处理程序中调用event.preventDefault将防止在选择该项目时关闭下拉菜单。
